channel.title: Posts on Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Philips Protocol Analytics
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://www.philips.com/a-w/security/security-advisories.html Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-44228: Fix NCSC-NL Software only products with customer owned Operating Systems. For products solutions where the server was provided by Philips, it will be Philips responsibility to validate and provide patches. Information or patch available in Inleft. Please contact your local service support team.
